# subject

**Instance Property**

The subject of the post.

## Declaration

```swift
var subject: String? { get set }
```

## Configuring the Service

- **menuItemTitle**: The title of the service in the Share menu.
- **recipients**: An array containing the user handles of the desired recipients.
